name: bootcamp-management-system
description: Bootcamps: - Retrieve a list of bootcamps from the database, allowing pagination, field selection, result limiting, and filtering by specific criteria. - Search for bootcamps. - Fetch information about a single bootcamp. - Allow authenticated users with the "publisher" or "admin" role to create new bootcamps, with field validation and restrictions on the number of bootcamps per publisher. - Enable bootcamp owners to upload photos for their bootcamps. - Allow bootcamp owners to update their bootcamp information, with validation on the update. - Provide a mechanism for bootcamp owners to delete their bootcamps. - Calculate and display the average cost of all courses offered by a bootcamp. - Calculate and display the average rating of reviews for a bootcamp.
